import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Card, CardBody, CardHeader, Progress, Row, Col, Button } from 'reactstrap'; class Confirmation extends Component{ saveAndContinue = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); this.props.nextStep(); } back = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); this.props.prevStep(); } render(){ const {values: { clusterType, clusterVersion, clusterId, services, recipes, dataPlaneApplications }} = this.props; return(

Step 5: Save bundle to library

    

Bundle Configuration
Cluster Type {clusterType}
Cluster Version {clusterVersion}
Services {JSON.stringify(services)}
Add-Ons {JSON.stringify(recipes)}
DataPlane Apps {JSON.stringify(dataPlaneApplications)}
) } } export default Confirmation;
